title: Causal Inference on Networks under Continuous Treatment Interference. (arXiv:2004.13459v2 [stat.ME] UPDATED)
abstract: This paper investigates the case of interference, when a unit's treatment also affects other units' outcome. When interference is at work, policy evaluation mostly relies on the use of randomized experiments under cluster interference and binary treatment. Instead, we consider a non-experimental setting under continuous treatment and network interference. In particular, we define spillover effects by specifying the exposure to network treatment as a weighted average of the treatment received by units connected through physical, social or economic interactions. We provide a generalized propensity score-based estimator to estimate both direct and spillover effects of a continuous treatment. Our estimator also allows to consider asymmetric network connections characterized by heterogeneous intensities. translated_title: 连续治疗干预下网络因果推断研究
translated_abstract: 本文研究的是干预情况，即一个单位的治疗也会影响其他单位的结果。当干扰因素发生时，政策评估主要依赖于在集群干扰和二元治疗下的随机实验。相反，我们考虑在连续治疗和网络干扰下的非实验设置。我们通过将网络治疗的暴露定义为通过物理、社交或经济互动连接的单位接受的治疗加权平均值来指定溢出效应。我们提供了一种广义倾向得分估计器，用于估计连续治疗的直接效应和溢出效应。我们的估计器还允许考虑异质强度的不对称网络连接。为了展示这种方法的有效性，我们调查了溢出效应如何影响农业市场政策干预的最优水平及其原因。我们的结果表明，在这种情况下...
tldr: 本文研究了连续治疗和网络干扰下的因果推断问题，提供了一种广义倾向得分估计器，用于估计连续治疗的直接效应和溢出效应，具有较高的应用价值。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates the issue of causal inference under continuous treatment and network interference, and proposes a generalized propensity score-based estimator to estimate both direct and spillover effects of a continuous treatment, which has valuable applications.
